title.en: Merched y Wawr Lampeter Branch celebrates 25th Anniversary
title.cy: Merched y Wawr Llanbedr Pont Steffan a'r Cylch yn Dathlu Chwarter Canrif

description.en:
Dathlu 25 mlynedd Cangen Llanbed yn 1997 yn y Kings Head:
Rhes Gefn: Barbara Jones; Mary Davies; Avril Williams; Beryl Davies; Dilwen Roderick; Mair James; Sadie Davies; Elizabeth Warmington; Eryl Jones; Gwen Jones, Ann Lewis; Janet Evans; Aerwen Griffiths; Elma Phillips; Mair Jones; Gwenda Richards.
Rhes Ganol:Margaret Jones Evans; Moyra Jones; Moyra Owen; Joan James; Lilian Band; Eunice Hughes; Glenys Morris; Olive Williams; Hazel (Twynog) Davies; Pat Davies; Sallie Davies; Bessie Jones; Margaret Roberts; Beryl Jones; Palma Stoneham; Mair Jones, Pentrebach; Noeleen Davies; Ray Jones; Menna Evans; Dorothy James; Nansi Jones; Eirlys Ffowc Elis; Mair Richards; Hazel (Noel) Davies; 
Rhes Flaen: Magwen Edwards; Rhiannon Jones; Gwenda Smith; Beti Evans; Valerie James (Llywydd Cenedlaethol); Gwyneth Morgan; Gwenfyl Jones; Eirios Jones; Bessie Roberts.
